trans-unit.source: System Requirements
trans-unit.target: 시스템 요구 사항

trans-unit.source: Install the latest Windows updates before installing WMF 5.0 RTM.
trans-unit.target: WMF 5.0 RTM을 설치하기 전에 최신 Windows 업데이트를 설치합니다.

trans-unit.source: You can install WMF 5.0 RTM only on the following operating systems:
trans-unit.target: 다음과 같은 운영 체제에만 WMF 5.0 RTM을 설치할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: | Operating System | Editions | Prerequisites | Package Links |
trans-unit.target: | 운영 체제 | 버전 | 필수 조건 | 패키지 링크 |

trans-unit.source: | Windows Server 2012 R2 | | | <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717507)">Win8.1AndW2K12R2-KB3134758-x64.msu</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> |
trans-unit.target: | Windows Server 2012 R2 | | | <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717507)">Win8.1AndW2K12R2-KB3134758-x64.msu</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> |

trans-unit.source: | Windows Server 2012 | | | <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717506)">W2K12-KB3134759-x64.msu</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> |
trans-unit.target: | Windows Server 2012 | | | <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717506)">W2K12-KB3134759-x64.msu</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> |

trans-unit.source: | Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 | All, except IA64 | <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855)">WMF 4.0</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> and <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx)">.NET Framework 4.5 or above</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> are installed| <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717504)">Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">|
trans-unit.target: | Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 | IA64를 제외한 모든 버전 | <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855)">WMF 4.0</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> 및 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx)">.NET Framework 4.5 이상</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">이 설치되어 있음| <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717504)">Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">|

trans-unit.source: | Windows 7 SP1 | All | <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855)">WMF 4.0</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> and <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx)">.NET Framework 4.5 or above</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> are installed | <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">x64:</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=717504)">Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">

trans-unit.source: Installation Instructions
trans-unit.target: 설치 지침

trans-unit.source: To install WMF 5.0 from Windows Explorer (or File Explorer):
trans-unit.target: Windows 탐색기(또는 파일 탐색기)에서 WMF 5.0을 설치하려면

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the folder into which you downloaded the MSU file.
trans-unit.target: MSU 파일을 다운로드한 폴더로 이동합니다.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the MSU to run it.
trans-unit.target: MSU를 두 번 클릭하여 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: To install WMF 5.0 from Command Prompt:
trans-unit.target: 명령 프롬프트에서 WMF 5.0을 설치하려면

trans-unit.source: After downloading the correct package for your computer's architecture, open a Command Prompt window with elevated user rights (Run as Administrator).
trans-unit.target: 컴퓨터의 아키텍처에 맞는 올바른 패키지를 다운로드한 후 관리자 권한(관리자 권한으로 실행)으로 명령 프롬프트 창을 엽니다.

trans-unit.source: On the Server Core installation options of Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows Server 2012 or Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1, Command Prompt opens with elevated user rights by default.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2, Windows Server 2012 또는 Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1의 Server Core 설치 옵션에서는 명령 프롬프트가 기본적으로 관리자 권한으로 열립니다.

trans-unit.source: Change directories to the folder into which you have downloaded or copied the WMF 5.0 installation package.
trans-unit.target: WMF 5.0 설치 패키지를 다운로드하거나 복사한 폴더로 디렉터리를 변경합니다.

trans-unit.source: Run one of the following commands:
trans-unit.target: 다음 명령 중 하나를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running Windows Server 2012 R2 or Windows 8.1 x64, run <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Win8.1AndW2K12R2-KB3134758-x64.msu /quiet</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2 또는 Windows 8.1 x64를 실행 중인 컴퓨터에서는 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Win8.1AndW2K12R2-KB3134758-x64.msu /quiet</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running Windows Server 2012, run <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">W2K12-KB3134759-x64.msu /quiet</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012를 실행 중인 컴퓨터에서는 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">W2K12-KB3134759-x64.msu /quiet</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 or Windows 7 SP1 x64, run <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu /quiet</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 또는 Windows 7 SP1 x64를 실행 중인 컴퓨터에서는 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Win7AndW2K8R2-KB3134760-x64.msu /quiet</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running Windows 8.1 x86, run <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Win8.1-KB3134758-x86.msu /quiet</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">.
trans-unit.target: Windows 8.1 x86을 실행 중인 컴퓨터에서는 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Win8.1-KB3134758-x86.msu /quiet</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: On computers that are running Windows 7 SP1 x86, run <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Win7-KB3134760-x86.msu /quiet</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">.
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 SP1 x86을 실행 중인 컴퓨터에서는 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Win7-KB3134760-x86.msu /quiet</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: Additional Installation Notes for Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1:
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 및 Windows 7 SP1에 대한 추가 설치 참고 사항:

trans-unit.source: Ensure following prerequisites have been met:
trans-unit.target: 다음 필수 조건이 충족되었는지 확인하세요.

trans-unit.source: Latest service pack is installed.
trans-unit.target: 최신 서비스 팩이 설치되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855)">WMF 4.0</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> is installed.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40855)">WMF 4.0</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">이 설치되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx)">.NET Framework 4.5 or above</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> is installed.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/5a4x27ek.aspx)">.NET Framework 4.5 이상</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">이 설치되어 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: WMF 4.0 Dependency
trans-unit.target: WMF 4.0 종속성

trans-unit.source: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1 systems have built-in PowerShell 2.0, WinRM, and WMI.
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 및 Windows 7 SP1 시스템에는 PowerShell 2.0, WinRM 및 WMI가 기본 제공됩니다.

trans-unit.source: WMF 3.0 and WMF 4.0 packages, which updates these built-in components, were released after the release of Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1.
trans-unit.target: 이러한 기본 제공 구성 요소를 업데이트하는 WMF 3.0 및 WMF 4.0 패키지는 Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 및 Windows 7 SP1의 릴리스 이후 릴리스되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Installing/Uninstalling WMF 3.0 and WMF 4.0 packages uncovered some issues in the following upgrade path:
trans-unit.target: WMF 3.0 및 WMF 4.0 패키지 설치/제거 시 다음 업그레이드 경로에서 몇 가지 문제가 확인되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Built-in --> WMF 4.0
trans-unit.target: 기본 제공 --> WMF 4.0

trans-unit.source: Built-in --> WMF 3.0 --> WMF4.0.
trans-unit.target: 기본 제공 --> WMF 3.0 --> WMF4.0.

trans-unit.source: We fixed all these issues in WMF 4.0 packages.
trans-unit.target: WMF 4.0 패키지에서 이러한 문제가 모두 해결되었습니다.

trans-unit.source: Hence, there is a prerequisite of WMF 4.0 for installing WMF 5.0 on Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1.
trans-unit.target: 따라서 Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1에 WMF 5.0을 설치하기 위해서는 WMF 4.0이 꼭 필요합니다.

trans-unit.source: Below are the specific issues you might encounter if you do not install WMF 4.0 before upgrading to WMF 5.0:
trans-unit.target: 다음은 WMF 4.0을 설치하지 않고 WMF 5.0으로 업그레이드하는 경우 발생할 수 있는 특정 문제입니다.

trans-unit.source: Forwarded Events log is unavailable and EventCollector log is not displayed in Event Viewer after you uninstall WMF 3.0 or WMF 5.0 (without the prerequisite WMF 4.0 installed) in Windows 7 SP1 and in Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 (<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2809215)">KB2809215</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">).
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 SP1 및 Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1에서 필수 조건 WMF 4.0이 설치되지 않은 상태로 WMF 3.0 또는 WMF 5.0을 제거한 후 전달된 이벤트 로그를 사용할 수 없고 EventCollector 로그가 이벤트 뷰어에 표시되지 않습니다(<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2809215)">KB2809215</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">).

trans-unit.source: Customization to <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">PSModulePath</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> environment variable gets reset to default value when you upgrade directly from built-in PowerShell 2.0 to WMF 5.0 (<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2872035)">KB2872035</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">) or from WMF 3.0 to WMF 5.0.
trans-unit.target: Windows 7 SP1 및 Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1에서 기본 제공 PowerShell 2.0을 WMF 5.0으로(<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2872035)">KB2872035</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">) 또는 WMF 3.0을 WMF 5.0으로(<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">KB2872047</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">) 직접 업그레이드할 경우

trans-unit.source: (<ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/2872047)">KB2872047</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">) in Windows 7 SP1 and in Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">PSModulePath</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> 환경 변수에 대한 사용자 지정 값이 기본값으로 다시 설정됩니다.

trans-unit.source: WinRM Dependency
trans-unit.target: WinRM 종속성

trans-unit.source: Windows PowerShell Desired State Configuration (DSC) depends on WinRM.
trans-unit.target: Windows PowerShell DSC(원하는 상태 구성)는 WinRM에 종속됩니다.

trans-unit.source: WinRM is not enabled by default on Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1.
trans-unit.target: WinRM은 Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 및 Windows 7 SP1에서 기본적으로 사용하도록 설정되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: To enable WinRM, in a Windows PowerShell elevated session, run <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Set-WSManQuickConfig</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">.
trans-unit.target: WinRM을 사용하도록 설정하려면 Windows PowerShell 관리자 권한 세션에서 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Set-WSManQuickConfig</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: Uninstallation Instructions
trans-unit.target: 제거 지침

trans-unit.source: Using Command Prompt
trans-unit.target: 명령 프롬프트 사용

trans-unit.source: Open <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Command Prompt.</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">명령 프롬프트</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 엽니다.

trans-unit.source: Run the <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/934307)">Windows Update Standalone Launcher</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> as shown below:
trans-unit.target: 아래와 같이 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="[" mdpost="](https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/kb/934307)">Windows 업데이트 독립 실행형 시작 관리자</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 실행합니다.

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2012 R2 and Windows 8.1:
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012 R2 및 Windows 8.1:

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2012:
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2012:

trans-unit.source: On Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 and Windows 7 SP1:
trans-unit.target: Windows Server 2008 R2 SP1 및 Windows 7 SP1:

trans-unit.source: Using Control Panel
trans-unit.target: 제어판 사용

trans-unit.source: Open <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Control Panel.</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">제어판</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">을 엽니다.

trans-unit.source: Open <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Programs</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">, then open <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Uninstall a program.</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">프로그램</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">을 연 다음 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">프로그램 제거</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 엽니다.

trans-unit.source: Click <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">View installed updates.</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">설치된 업데이트 보기</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 클릭합니다.

trans-unit.source: Select <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Windows Management Framework 5.0</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> from the list of installed updates.
trans-unit.target: 설치된 업데이트 목록에서 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Windows Management Framework 5.0</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">을 선택합니다.

trans-unit.source: This corresponds to <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">KB3134758</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">, <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">KB3134759</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">, or <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">KB3134760</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">.
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">KB3134758</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">, <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">KB3134759</ctype="x-NOTFOUND"> 또는 <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="*" mdpost="*">KB3134760</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">에 해당합니다.

trans-unit.source: Click <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">Uninstall.</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">
trans-unit.target: <ctype="x-NOTFOUND" mdpre="**" mdpost="**">제거</ctype="x-NOTFOUND">를 클릭합니다.
